Rule: Act out a scene from a movie. The other player guesses the movie. If correct, you drink; if not, they drink.
Answer a "Would you rather" question or drink.
Flip a coin. Winner picks who drinks.
Hum a song of your choice. The other player guesses the song. If correct, you drink; if not, they drink.
Start a staring contest. Winner picks who drinks.
Play rock, paper, scissors. Winner picks who drinks.
Pick a superhero and act out this superhero without talking. The other player guesses. If correct, you drink; if not, they drink.
Pick an animal and act out this animal without talking. The other player guesses. If correct, you drink; if not, they drink.
Guess the colour of the other player's underwear. If correct, they drink; if not, you drink.
Play a game of thumb war. Winner picks who drinks.
Say the kinkiest thing you've done or drink.
Do 13 pushups or take 2 drinks.
Show the other player the last five photos on your phone or drink twice.
Tell a joke. If the other player laughs, they drink; if no one laughs, you drink twice.
The other player can ask you any question. You can either answer truthfully or refuse and drink.
The other player can dare you to do anything. You can either fulfil the dare or refuse and drink.
Without touching anything, both of you must balance on one leg. First to lose balance picks who drinks.
You must either take off an article of clothing or drink.
Only speak with one or two-syllable words until someone messes up. That player drinks.
Ask the other player a true or false question about yourself. If they answer correctly, you drink; if not, they drink.
Guess what time it is without looking. Whoever is furthest off drinks.
Speak in third player until someone messes up. That player drinks.
Make any action, and the other player must repeat all previous actions and add another. Continue until someone messes up. That player drinks.
Pick a word. Take turns saying a word that relates to the previous word. The player that hesitates or says a non-related word drinks.
Pick a word. Take turns saying a word that rhymes with it. The player that hesitates or repeats a word drinks.
Guess the colour of the other player's underwear. If correct, they drink; if not, you drink.
Starting with you, take turns naming a colour. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a colour. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a country. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a country. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a fruit. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a fruit. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a land animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a land animal. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming a spice. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats a spice. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming an insect. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats an insect. That player drinks.
Starting with you, take turns naming an ocean animal. Continue until someone hesitates or repeats an ocean animal. That player drinks.
Tell two truths and a lie. The other player can guess. If correct, you drink; if wrong, they drink.
Waterfall! Start drinking and the other player must drink as long as you do.
After this card is read, both players must play in silence until it’s your turn again. The first player to laugh or talk drinks and ends the silence.
Keep your eyes closed until it’s your turn again. If you open your eyes, you drink.
Make a rule for the other player to follow until it’s your turn again. If they break the rule, they drink.
The player farthest from you makes a rule for you to follow until it’s your turn again. If you break the rule, you drink.
Make a rule that both players have to follow until it’s your turn again. If either player breaks the rule, they drink.
Talk with an accent until your next turn. If caught not speaking in the accent, you drink.
Whoever drank in the last round picks two people to drink (they can pick the same player twice).
You cannot laugh until it’s your turn again. If you do, you drink.
You cannot make eye contact with anyone until it’s your turn again. If you do, you drink.
Drink! Drink! Both of you drink!
